form.name: has_diarrheoa_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC Diarrhoea> Has Diarrheoa Two

field.name: Does the child have any of the following signs?
Diarrhoea with severe dehydration
field.options: Lethargic or Unconscious | Sunken eyes |Not able to drink or drinking poorly | Skin pinch goes back very slowly | Click here to take action

field.name: Diarrhea with some dehydration
field.options: Restless, irritable | Sunken eyes | Drinks eagerly, thirsty | Skin pinch goes back slowly|Click here to take action

field.name: Diarrhoea with no dehydration
field.options: Not enough signs to classify as some or severe dehydration |Click here to take action

field.name: Severe persistent diarrhoea plus severe or some dehydration
field.options: Restless or irritable | Sunken eyes | Drinks eagerly, thirsty |Skin pinch goes back very slowly|Click here to take action

field.name: Persistent diarrhoea with no dehydration
field.options: If diarrhoea persisted ≥ 14 days|Click here to take action
